question: This company topped the Fortune 500 list of 2017.
explanation: Walmart topped in the Fortune 500 list of 2017. Fortune 500 marks the 63rd running of the list. In total, Fortune 500 companies represent two-thirds of the U.S. GDP with $12 trillion in revenues, $890 billion in profits, $19 trillion in market value, and employ 28.2 million people worldwide.
